dialogue: We're borrowing a policy from Google because they are so awesome.
You may now use 20% of your workday on your own project ideas.
Are you saying we can do 20% less work on our core functions?
I'm saying you can work on your own project ideas for 20% of your time.
Okay... so... if the 20% doesn't come out of our work hours, where does it come from?
I think he's trying to make us work 20% longer for the same amount of pay.
We could just tell people we do it, but not do it.
Same as Google! That's all I'm asking.
